gaps.name: Arrays & Strings
gaps.description: Understanding indexing, slicing, and common operations on arrays and strings.

gaps.name: Linked Lists
gaps.description: Implementing and manipulating singly and doubly linked lists.

gaps.name: Stacks & Queues
gaps.description: Applying stack and queue operations for problems involving order and scheduling.

gaps.name: Trees & Graphs
gaps.description: Traversing, building, and optimizing data in trees and graphs using DFS, BFS, etc.

gaps.name: Dynamic Programming
gaps.description: Breaking problems into subproblems and using memoization/tabulation for optimization.

gaps.name: Searching & Sorting
gaps.description: Implementing binary search, merge sort, quick sort, and understanding time complexities.

gaps.name: NoSQL (MongoDB)
gaps.description: Working with flexible schemas, aggregation pipelines, and document-based storage.

gaps.name: ORMs (Prisma/SQLAlchemy)
gaps.description: Using object-relational mapping tools to interact with databases in code.

present.name: SQL
present.description: Writing queries, joins, subqueries, and understanding schema design.

present.name: PostgreSQL
present.description: Using Postgres features like indexes, constraints, and functions for scalable DBs.
